venue.address_1: I'll email the address to all yesses and maybes
venue.name: Debbie's House

item.description:
Hey all you trivia buffs!
Ray has invited us all to trivia night at the 99 Restaurant in Sommerville, right off rout 93. You wont win any prizes, but you might get your 15 seconds of fame and the respect of your peers. It's just a fun, friendly group of folks who get together every Friday night and get to know each other and show off their caboodle of useless information. The fun starts at 9:00, so head on over to the bar and look for Ray. He'll be there by 8:00 ready for a challenge. This isn't an official meetup, so you can either email Ray and let him know you're coming or else just show up. You can check out this 99 website for directions, but it's very easy to get to and parking is free and easy.

debbie

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Trivia night at the 99 Restaurant
